definition: tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: For proliferation inhibit, the effect of gasoline exhaust is slightly greater than methanol exhaust.
sentences.chinese: 汽油车尾气对细胞增殖的抑制作用略大于甲醇车尾气。

sentences.english: The catalyst purification is a popular means for the purification of motocycle exhaust emission in the world.
sentences.chinese: 催化净化是国内外普遍采用的尾气净化法。

sentences.english: PAHs are in car or bus exhaust and emissions from residential heating and power generation.
sentences.chinese: 多环芳烃来自于汽车尾气以及住宅供暖和发电的排放。

sentences.english: On Earth, polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons are found on burnt toast and in automobile exhaust.
sentences.chinese: 在地球上，烤糊的面包和汽车尾气里都含有稠环芳烃。

sentences.english: This is to compensate for the amount of fresh additives injected into the offgas stream.
sentences.chinese: 然后在尾气气流中补充一定数量的新鲜添加剂。

sentences.english: The trend of automobile exhaust in Hengshui is fluctuating in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 衡水市近几年汽车尾气污染呈起伏下降趋势。

sentences.english: First of all, much tail gas released by cars harm pollutes the fresh air gravely.
sentences.chinese: 首先，汽车尾气的释放严重危害了新鲜的空气。

sentences.english: In the paper, an experimental bench which simulating multiengine tail gas heat source is researched and built.
sentences.chinese: 研究建立了一个模拟多种发动机尾气热源的试验台。

sentences.english: More than 90% of radioiodine goes to gas-off system by sparging- air in the process of dissolution.
sentences.chinese: 以上的放射性碘随鼓泡气体进入尾气系统。

sentences.english: He looked back to see the hydrocarbon count registering from the exhaust sniffer.
sentences.chinese: 他回头看了看尾气探测器显示的碳氢化合物读数。

sentences.english: The pressure-creosoted method was employed to recover the solvent in tailings.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了用加压法回收尾气中的溶剂。

sentences.english: It is shown that the recycling of residual gas can create great economic efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明含氢尾气的回收可以创造极大的经济效益。
汽车尾气像吸血鬼残害我们生命。

sentences.english: The tail gas chimney tower frame in Zhong county natural gas purifying project was needed to hoist.
sentences.chinese: 在忠县天然气净化厂工程中要吊装尾气烟囱塔架。

sentences.english: Automobile exhaust tetraethyl lead is a highly toxic substance.
sentences.chinese: 汽车尾气中的四乙基铅是剧毒物质。
